name: Elephant In The Room
description:
A simple particle simulator with a pre-placed escape hole. Or, if you're one of the particles, a terrifying scenario where you desperately want to stay as far away as possible from all others but somewhere in the inescapable room is a being who can't be sensed in any way but whose existence is so in-graspable that mere contact will destroy you....the elephant.

Left click to place a person.

Right click to place a dog.

Middle click to place a car.

Avoid the elephant at all costs.
